title: Convert to function — as_function2
code: f <- as_function2(~ .x + 1) f(10) #> [1] 11  g <- as_function2(~ -1 * .) g(4) #> [1] -4  h <- as_function2(~ .x - .y) h(6, 3) #> [1] 3  as_function2("mean") #> function (x, ...)  #> UseMethod("mean") #> <bytecode: 0x558f23a24c40> #> <environment: namespace:base> as_function2("base::mean") #> function (x, ...)  #> UseMethod("mean") #> <bytecode: 0x558f23a24c40> #> <environment: namespace:base>  # Functions created from a formula have a special class: rlang::is_lambda(f) #> [1] TRUE rlang::is_lambda(as_function2(function() "foo")) #> [1] FALSE
